metadata.title: Furkan Akif Ä°ÅŸlek - Portfolio
metadata.description: Notes on my experiences in software development processes, errors I encountered, and modern web technologies.

home.description: Hello, I'm Furkan. I work as a full stack developer in the finance industry. We redesign and code old codes with DDD, we work in accordance with microservice architecture. The technologies I use are .netcore, nextjs, reactjs, mssql, kubernates, redux, elk, figma etc. I also write my own mobile applications with Flutter and React Native. I have some applications in the testing phase. I have a character that is determined to work, suitable for teamwork, thinks and starts quickly.
home.sectionTitle: My Computer, My Keys and Me
home.sectionDescription1: I have experience working with teams. I am familiar with the Agile approach. In my team, I primarily strive to contribute with solution-oriented, new creative ideas. I particularly try to assist the team on the front-end side.
home.sectionDescription2: I continue to learn constantly during the software development process. I have gained valuable experience during this process and am still learning. I develop projects using the latest technologies at my company.

items.title: Clean Code
items.description: Building sustainable, readable, and scalable architectures is my priority. I have experience with microservice architecture.

items.title: User Experience
items.description: I always aim for user-friendly interfaces and making the most of background optimisation.

items.title: Continuous Improvement
items.description: I follow new technologies, current events, and open-source resources.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.company: Intertech Bilgi Ä°ÅŸlem ve Paz. A.Å
details: I have experience working at Intertech in the field of software services for banks as a software developer in the Campaign Management team from CRM teams. We are creating decision-making infrastructure and screens with JSON logic for the decision mechanism in our Project.

I worked on the microservice transformation of the project containing personnel scorecard information. I saved time by using a multiple conditional and table structure with a mapping method by mapping in a single table. I used backend netcore, rabbitmq, kubernetes technologies; on the frontend side I used next.js, antd and redux toolkit technologies for the frontend.
During this time, I worked with technologies such as Net Core, MSSQL, Next.js, ReactJS, Entity Framework, and Kubernetes.
On the backend side, I wrote SOLID compatible services using Net Core and Entity Framework.
On the frontend side, connect to Next.JS with Gateway to develop user-friendly screens.
Additionally, use auxiliary tools like Jira and Jenkins.
Using the Ant Design (antd) library for React with TypeScript.
Most of the projects used the Git version control system, while a few opted for the TFS control system.

experiences.title: Full Stack Software Intern
details: At Workintech, we collaborate with sectoral companies on joint projects and provide comprehensive training in the software industry.
We have successfully completed approximately 85 projects using ReactJS, NodeJS, Python, PostgreSQL, and ExpressJS.
Additionally, I served as a support instructor for other trainees and interns on various projects for four months.

experiences.title: Freelancer
details: Upwork - Container Dashboard, Intraday Reporting Dashboard
R10 - Web Site Speed Optimization, Web Site SEO Application

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.subtitle: Ready for your next project? Leave a message, let's compile the code.
contact.description: Just one enter away to turn your ideas into reality.

form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: You can write details about your project here...

posts.title: Amina Dose - Med Reminder
posts.description: AnimaDose is your smart, personal health companion for flawless medication tracking and timely reminders. With a clean design and thoughtful features, AnimaDose helps you stay in sync with your daily health routine.

posts.title: Digital Dental Health Support Platform
posts.description: DentaLab is a modern and fully responsive dental health platform developed using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. With its interface directly adapted from Figma design, it offers a flawless and user-friendly experience on all devices.

posts.title: PocketPath - Wallet Management
posts.description: Written in Flutter. You can track your money with this app. You can add expenses and income by setting a scheduled goal for yourself. You can also see your upcoming, old and active goals.

posts.title: Mental Health Support Platform
posts.description: MentalHeal is a modern and mobile-friendly mental health support platform developed with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. It stands out with its design directly applied from Figma, clean interface and user-friendly experience.

posts.title: Admin Dashboard
posts.description: Admin Dashboard is a modern management panel built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit, Framer Motion and Recharts, featuring smooth animations, interactive charts and real-time data visualization.

posts.title: TUDORA
posts.description: Written in Flutter. You can get help from other students when you're stuck, and earn points if your answers are correct. You can earn points by solving weekly quizzes on time. You can make daily plans and check their completion status. With focus mode, you can focus only on the lesson and earn points when the time is up. You can also follow other students and see your ranking among those you follow and all users.
